value.title: Beijing Makes Self-Driving Vehicles A Priority

value.title: Michigan Self-Driving Vehicle Corridor Aims to Lead Nation

value.title: Baidu’s Revenue Shrinks Under Pressure from ByteDance in Ads
value.excerpt: Baidu Inc.’s quarterly revenue shrank 1% and its projections suggest sales could slide again, as rivals like ByteDance Ltd. continue to chip away at its core advertising business.

value.title: Self-driving car only lanes? They're coming to an autonomous corridor in Michigan

value.title: Anthony Levandowski Gets 18 Months in Prison for Stealing Google Self-Driving Car Files
